# Continuing Education Resources

## R Workflow

[Frank Harrell's R Workflow](https://hbiostat.org/rflow/):    
This book is an excellent guide to setting up and using a reproducible R workflow. Focused on biostats, but relevant to everyone using R. Covers reporting, handling missing data, descriptive statistics, data manipulation, merging data, graphics, analysis, caching results, parallel computation, and simulation.
